ygData.subject: RE: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fellow man
ygData.msgSnippet: Brother, As I have expressed in my prior missives, it is not wrong for one to take a life in defense. We should seek peace and the glory it offers, but be not
ygData.messageBody:
Brother,

As I have expressed in my prior missives, it is not wrong for one to take a
life in defense. We should seek peace and the glory it offers, but be not
afraid to engage our talents in the act of self-preservation and the
defense of
those near to us. Those vilest of beast that would attack unprovoked are
deserving of a response in kind. One should strive to keep free from murder
for
profit as it is common of only the basest of creatures. May Quellious guide
you
and keep you safe.

In Quellious' name,

Manjushri
Bearer of the yellow sash of the Ashen Order
(Fennin Ro)

At 06:07 AM 9/13/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Jeffrey Sue <jsue@...>
>
>hmm may be tough for you to level if you don't kill any races that are
>''civilized''. by ''civilized'' i assume you mean they have a society, since
>bandits who KOS other people, could hardly be considered civilized
>by the normal definition of the word. No kobolds in solusek, no goblins
>in runnyeye or permafrost, no lizardmen in cazic, no ogres in najena, no
>orcs in crushbone... what's left?
>
